tossup_question: 10) BIOLOGY  When a plant cell is placed into a hypertonic solution,the cytoplasm in the plant cell shrinks away from the cell wall. What is the term that describes this phenomenon?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: PLASMOLYSIS(DO NOT ACCEPT: OSMOSIS; LYSIS)
bonus_question: 10) BIOLOGY  Animals excrete various forms of nitrogenous [ny-TROJ-uh-nuhs] wastes that are mainly the result of the breakdown of which of the following?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Cellulose and triglycerides [try-GLIS-uh-ryds]
X) Proteins and nucleic acids 
Y) Glycolipids and glycerol
Z) Starches and proteins
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) PROTEINS AND NUCLEIC ACIDS
